We are very happy with the feedback we are receiving from our product at http://www.bitaccel.com/ Just check out our site and see for yourself!

We allow most anything that is legal. We allow IRC and VPN.

We strive to be transparent! Need proof? Check out some of our server information here -http://stats.bitaccel.com/

Servers hosted in Buffalo, NY, Los Angeles, and Switzerland! 1 Cores 1GB Ram - Guaranteed 60GB HDD - Raid10 1TB Bandwidth (2048GB) 1* IPV4 $4.34/mo with promo code LE38 Order NOW!

Be sure to use promo code LE38!

Test IP for NY: 192.210.150.2 Test File for NY: 192.210.150.2/100mb.test

Test IP for LA: 173.254.233.130 Test File for LA: 173.254.233.130/100mb.test

_We are now doing preorders for Zurich Swizterland. Once we have accumulated 30 orders (enough demand) by July 5th we will get a swizterland server running. If we do not reach this goal everyone that ordered will receive a full refund_
